content.rendered:
Directed by Rajeev Ravi

Written by Gopan Chidambaran

Star Nivin Pauly (Mattancherry Moidu). Poornima Indrajith. Indrajith Sukumaran (Santo Gopalan). Sudev Nair (Pacheek). Arjun Asokan (Hamza). Nimisha Sajayan. Manikandan R. Achari (Umboocha). Darshana Rajendran. Joju George. Vaisakh Shankar

Language Malayalam

Producers Sukumar Thekkepatt. Arun Kumar V.R.

Production Collective Phase One. Pauly Jr. Thekkepat Films
